thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com
thread.title: Shannon

author: Shannon
title: Shannon
text: We have been pleased with HelloFresh. The meals have been great, only a few we weren't fond of. It's so nice to not have to grocery shop as much with the delivery to our house, which is consistent. I do wish the recipes came in the book form like they did the first two weeks instead of the giant card form. The meals tend to take longer than stated on the cards, but nothing that isn't feasible. Overall very happy with the decision to subscribe to HelloFresh!
